title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Developed a credit card fraud detection model with 97.3% accuracy, utilizing resampling techniques and MLPClassifier to handle class imbalance and improve fraud detection.

title: Minesweeper
description: The Minesweeper project is a Java-based game that generates a grid with hidden bombs, calculates adjacent bomb counts, and provides an interactive GUI using Swing.

title: Real-time COVID-19 Data Web Scraping
description: This project scrapes real-time COVID-19 data from the Worldometer website, processes it, and stores it in a cleaned Pandas DataFrame for analysis.
